Title: Santos expects Darwin LNG could shut in up to two months; Bayu-Undan still producing
Description: The Bayu-Undan gas field in Timor-Leste continues to produce gas at a rate that allows Santos to operate its 3.7 mtpa Darwin LNG export plant in Australia’s Northern Territory. But that rate is expected to fall in the next month or two to a level that no longer supports LNG production at Darwin LNG.
Author: CK

Title: South Korea’s Koen seeks five-year LNG supplies starting from 2027
Description: South Korean power utility firm Koen is seeking 0.65 mtpa of LNG to be delivered over five years from 2027 through a tender closing on June 20.
Author: CK
